name: Retro Big Naturals - Photorealistic Natural Boobs
description:
• Big boobs? Check.

  • Natural boobs? Check.

  • Retro styling? Check

This LoRA is trained on retro imagery of big natural breasts and women. It produces images that tend to favor an "old school" style of natural women -- it does big boobs, but they're natural and trained on more natural bodies. It also tends to favor pubic hair, and natural tanning (read: tan lines). It also favors a photographic style that's film based, grainier, and overall more of a retro style.

This LoRA has been heavily baked. I recommend using it at 0.7 -- it'll definitely artifact up higher. And it's fine at 0.4-0.6 as well.

Most realistic models tend to work OK, but gotta say that Art + Eros tribute seems to really jive with this LoRA.

The keyword isn't required at all, but you may find that using the retrobigguns keyword helps here and again.

Depending on your taste, but I have to say that the prompt word thicc seems to work awesome with this one. Bigger boobs usually means bigger women, and they fit so well and look better. But, to each their own, you do you.

I'm still working through my training procedures, so, hopefully get some v2's of the LoRA's I have up soon, but in the meanwhile my best procedure is to overbake somewhat and then reduce the weights. So, if you set the weight too high, prepare for it to be deep fried.
